list_translation_mean.translate_mean: chổ đất đắp cao trước nhà

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a level paved area or platform next to a building; a patio or veranda.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: breakfast is served on the terrace
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bữa sáng được phục vụ trên sân thượng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: each of a series of flat areas made on a slope, used for cultivation.
make or form (sloping land) into a number of level flat areas resembling a series of steps.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the slope had to be terraced
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Độ dốc phải được bậc thang
